Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
SinglePlayerGame
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
An object Game is created every time some players start a game. It contains the references to all the Players and the information about the game in progress, such for example the DevCards available on the Table or the actions done by the players during their turns.

It also receive the information from the server containing what a player wants to do and, in case it is possible, handle them modifying the players' status on the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players, java.util.ArrayList<DevCard> cards, int gameId, int maxPlayer)
      Instantiates a new Game saving all the information about it, such for example the reference to the Players, and handing out all the necessary for the game like the table's development card or the market's resources.
      Parameters:
      players - the players joined to this game.
      cards - the development cards to place on the Table.
      gameId - the ID on the server of this particular game.
      maxPlayer - the number of Players in this game.

  • Method Details

    • changePlayer

      public void changePlayer​(Player original, Player newPlayer)
      When a new Player with a new abilities gets created, replace him, in the Game's list of players, in the same position of the original one.
      Parameters:
      original - the Player that is going to be substituted.
      newPlayer - the new Player's reference.

    • getTable

      public Table getTable()
      Gets Table.
      Returns:
      the Table

    • notify

      public void notify​(Request req)
      Receives from the Player, client side, a Request containing what the player would like to do. For each of them controls: if the player who send the request is the current player on the game, if the player can do those actions in this moment if the player can do those action according to his status' possibilities.

      If all the conditions are satisfied modifies the player's status on the server and create an Update containing all the modifies bring by the player's action. Otherwise if only one of the requirements isn't satisfied create an ErrorUpdate.

      It also controls if the requirements for ending the game are satisfied by the current player.

      Parameters:
      req - the request received from the Player, client side.

    • fpAdvancement

      public void fpAdvancement​(int discardedSteps, int playerSteps)
      Calls all the Players, different by the curr player, to make them moveForward on their FaithPath of a number of steps equal to the discarded resources by the current player in this turn; calls the current player to make him move forward of a number of steps equal to the number of all faith points obtained by the player in his turn.

      After every movement of someone, check if it has reached a Pope Space, in this case check the advancement of every player on their Faith Path and add them or not some Victory Points.

      Parameters:
      discardedSteps - the number of FAITH resources discarded by the current player that make other players move.
      playerSteps - the number of FAITH resources obtained by the player in his turn that make him move.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(Player newPlayer)
      Add Player to this Game.
      Parameters:
      newPlayer - the new player

    • endgame

      public void endgame()
      Called when the last turn of the Game is finished. Create an EndgameUpdate containing the winner and the victory points of each Players.

    • createNewGameUpdate

      public Update createNewGameUpdate()
      When tha Game starts create an NewGameUpdate containing for each Player, 4 different LeaderCards from which he has to choose 2 and, according to the number of players in the game, some resources of their choice and some Faith Points.
      Returns:
      the NewGameUpdate.
